name: Texas Hold'em Poker Online - Holdem Poker Stars
name_original: Texas Hold'em Poker Online - Holdem Poker Stars
description:
#1 Online Porker game in Indonesia!

Play LIVE Texas Hold’em Poker against millions of real players ONLINE!

Get $5K in chips FREE for your first time playing plus $2K in chips FREE as DAILY bonuses!

FEATURES:
- Play live Poker with friends and random players
- Login with Facebook or play as guest
- Invite your Facebook friends to play Poker together
- Play online over mobile network or Wi-Fi
- Get free daily bonuses
- Chat with your poker buddies
- Buy chips
- Enjoy smooth gameplay with perfect graphics, and sounds
- Choose the avatar and nickname you like
- Raise your experience level
- Track your game results and stats
